lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because:
“For it is in giving that we receive.” St. Francis of Assisi
"You make a living by what you get, but you make a life by what you give." Winston Churchill

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: My life changed when I received a grant during my last semester of my college studies. I was able to become the woman I had only been able to dream about becoming. I hope to share a part of the generosity that was given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with survivors of family violence to find safety, healing and peace in their lives through local community groups and law enforcement. Now, I'm using those skills to raise my daughter and explore all that life has to offer.

lender.name: Kaitlyn
lender.occupation: international citizen sector org for social change
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to build a better life for themselves and their families

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help another become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I assist realtors with the paperwork it takes to sell or buy a home.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I love the idea and the way that it is set up.
lender.occupational_info: Financial analysis

lender.name: Shiv Shreya
lender.loan_because: We want to help people

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.loan_because: I want to aid small business entrepreneurs

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I think this site is a great tool to help people from al over the world, I hope the popularity grows. People helping people thats what the world needs
lender.occupational_info: I work as a manager at a new home building company

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach English to kids in Japan. Now I make boring software. Someday I hope to make non-boring software.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live better lives.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of microcredit to improve the lives of individuals. It is not the only solution to poverty, but it is a powerful tool.
lender.occupational_info: It feels good to take a broken bike and make it whole again. It is a service I would like to promote in developing countries as well.

lender.name: Annabelle and Mike
lender.loan_because: We want to give people the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We strive to help businesses become more conscious of the effects of their actions on people and the natural environment.

lender.name: Chan
lender.loan_because: To give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer technician for a large corporation. I install and repair desktop pc's, printers and software.

lender.name: Pallavi
lender.loan_because: I think that people who want to work hard for a living deserve a chance. I am fortunate enough to pursue the future I want and I'd like to help others have the oppurtunity to do so as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a doctor. I'd like to be a pediatrician one day, but only time will tell. :)

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: 1. It's easy to do. 2. It's not charity. 3. It really helps people create wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer who tries to keep the government open and transparent. Too many governmental decisions are made secretly and favor the few rather than the many.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate.

lender.name: Tim and Callie
lender.loan_because: I feel it is one of the most impactful ways I can improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help families understand what they need to do to reach their financial goals.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: it is my choice.

lender.name: Susan & Jeremy
lender.loan_because: God has gifted us with enough to share with those less fortunate. We are not only asked to share, we greatly enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: Jeremy sells welding equipment to produce everything from cars to buildings to ships. Susan cares for our daughter Stella and for our home.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: "Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible."

lender.name: weepstah
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers an alternative way to fund people trying to get ahead. Providing money via Kiva is much more satisfying then most other ways I spend it, and the majority of business people who apply for funding could really show the US (my home country) how to borrow and use money responsibly.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology - supporting a variety of Data Warehousing software packages. Consider me a jack-of-many-trades - I work with a general understanding of how all the pieces fit together and apply that to specific projects and applications that use software that I have experience with.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise and know that working to improve our lives is the way to build a solid future. I loan because I've been successful in part because of other's help and now I want to be the helper.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are demonstrating a desire to work hard to realize their dreams
lender.occupational_info: We manage computer systems for many different companies around the world

lender.name: The Shadowlight Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with abundance and, in gratitude, we pass that on.
lender.occupational_info: We look for ways to make a difference in peoples lives.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help elderly people regain and maintain their mobility and independence.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I think life is pointless without sharing it with others and I extend this philosophy to economics. I loan to people who contribute to their communities and I choose microlenders based on the interest rate they charge.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an assistant registrar at a major university.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: This work is close to my heart & I can see the valuable contribution it's making.

lender.name: Glenn & Jo
lender.loan_because: The best way to promote capitalism as a system is to help to provide capital to entrepreneurs. The system has worked for us and we want to help others to get a leg up.

lender.name: Karen & Ron
lender.loan_because: No one can do everything, but everyone can do something. We are thankful for what we have and want to help others create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Karen manages an international assignment program for her company. Ron is retired and helps others through his carpentry and construction skills including work with Katrina relief and Habit for Humanity.

lender.name: Isa and Lucca
lender.loan_because: I like to have lemonade stands. And this week, I did my lemonade stand for Kiva. I like helping people and animals.

lender.name: Roxy
lender.loan_because: I truly believe our reason for being on this earth...is to reach out to others....
lender.occupational_info: Caring for a loving husband and three magnificent sons (and two beloved dogs) who are my gifts from God....

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: if you give, you begin to live.

lender.name: MOSH Family
lender.loan_because: To connect with people across the globe

lender.name: Gary from Texas
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company selling aircraft internationally. I also do some oil and gas work.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: 16 years ago I was a new mom, alone, unemployed, and suffering depression. With a little help from my brother I was able to pull myself together. I paid him back after I got on my feet even though he had given me the money as a gift and not a loan but I could never forgot how much his assistance had helped give me hope. It was with much joy that I returned the money to him.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small office doing secretarial and bookkeeping duties.

lender.name: MinhYen
lender.loan_because: I beleive if one is willing to work hard for his/her family then he/she deserves a helping hand.

lender.name: John & Rose
lender.loan_because: Hopefully, in small ways, it can make a difference. And we like the idea of interest free loans to those working to make their lives better.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Got introduced to the idea of Kiva lending and finally found a way to give but knowing exactly where my donation would be used

lender.name: Hana
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language. Wanna learn / practice / communicate in a language? Got to lang-8.com : ) (no, I'm not affiliated!)

lender.name: Max and Emy
lender.loan_because: and it's only the giving that makes you what you are
lender.occupational_info: Emy is a teacher, Max is a computer engineer. I worked for so many years only for myself, now it is time to work for the world around me.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: jeannine
lender.loan_because: i can and i should.

lender.name: Brooks
lender.loan_because: To do my small part to help someone far away with their business is exciting and fulfilling!
lender.occupational_info: I replenish the goods in a large grocery store in the United States.

lender.name: Special K
lender.loan_because: Growing up in the slums of the murder capitol of the world I know how just one thing can change a person's life forever.

lender.name: Mark Agwonah Memorial
lender.loan_because:
This is a lending group in memory of Kiva borrower Mark Agwonah, who contributed greatly to his community and was tragically lost to the Kiva family on July 15th, 2007 under mysterious circumstances.
Mark Agwonah was 30 years old and an only son. He left behind his mother and two dependents, a boy and a girl, who are members of his extended family. The parents of one of the dependent died due to HIV/AIDS and the other dependent was abandoned during the 1992 land clashes in the Transmara region of Kenya.
Mark was the founding member of a program called Youth Empowerment Centre. The Centre educates young men and women to help them start small businesses and also supports them with small loans.
lender.occupational_info:
We are a group of people from www.kivafriends.org, who were shocked and outraged by what happened to Mark and want to ensure his legacy by making loans to Kenya. Mark has been an inspiring example for many and we do not want his legacy to fade.
The brutal death of a member of our community is a blow to all of us. If you want to join us, go to www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,682.0.html and post there.
We also set up a fund to support Mark's mother, who is now solely responsible for the two children. If you want to know more, please go to: www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,857.0.html

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: if i can't be working next to them, I want to help provide the means for them to get to their goal.
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate in style.

lender.name: Gottfried
lender.loan_because: To help a little bit !!!!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Bright Sky
lender.loan_because: It matters.
lender.occupational_info: The Bright Sky Foundation is my small way of making a difference, and I feel honoured to have the opportunity to make such a meaningful and lasting contribution to the world. I am a web developer and business professional by day... and a lender to the world's most deserving and determined entrepreneurs by night! ~Sherri

lender.name: Kelly and Emelyn
lender.loan_because: I want to make even a small difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: I live in fear of having my job outsourced. I work with business people to solve their needs using computers.

lender.name: Brittney
lender.loan_because: I can...so why not?

lender.name: R&J
lender.loan_because: "We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men." Herman Melville

lender.name: Deena
lender.loan_because: I want to do all I can to nurture the world and bring all of us closer. "Peace is achieved one person at a time, through a series of friendships." -Fatma Reda

lender.name: Rosemarie
lender.loan_because: I can, and it connects me in a direct and personal way with people all over the world who are struggling to build better lives for their families.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help. we have been given opportunities here why not give those same opportunities around the world

lender.name: Franz
lender.loan_because: Because I want to see people in developing countries make something out of themselves, get ahead and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I own an "Operational Excellence" monitoring firm, specializing in the foodservice sector.

lender.name: Sadsac
lender.loan_because: Hank and John told me to!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 10 yr old children.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: it is important to increase the number of successful businesses in the world so that people can be responsible and self-sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: In addition to managing my investments, I work on our local school board to improve public education.

lender.name: Håkan
lender.loan_because: I believe that lending money to a good business-idea is better than just to give without a plan for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work with electrical power. I supervise and plan the maintenance of the powersystem.

lender.name: Matthew V.
lender.loan_because: I want to help promote fiscal responsibility and enable the poor to control their own outcome.
lender.occupational_info: I strategically source Biological API and analytical and formulations development services in order to drive Lilly's portfolio of medicines.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in people learning to fish.

lender.name: Vegard
lender.loan_because: it seems like a great approach to fight poverty, enabling people to help themselves in areas of the world where loans are not easy to acquire for regular people.
lender.occupational_info: I study social economics at the University of Oslo.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: it seems like a natural thing to do. Kiva makes it possible.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a new house or find a buyer for a house they already own.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to become better readers and writers.

lender.name: Herlon
lender.occupational_info: - Internet and telecommunications services

lender.name: Demola Fagbayimu
lender.loan_because: i want to expand my productivity in order to generate more funds in order to increase my financial status. I also want to loan so as to establish my business ideas... and thereafter be a lender unto others.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because:
My bible says that when one of my brothers is in need, I must lend to him freely without interest
Also, I don't have a lot of money and can't afford to give much, but I can afford to lend.
Also also, it's a very sustainable, afirming way of helping others
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student full time. I also work as an office manager, babysitter, tutor, and Spanish teacher.

lender.name: JohnW
lender.loan_because: I want to help in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but I work part time at Taos

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It's an amazing idea
lender.occupational_info: I work in welfare administration in N.Ireland

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: it's a beautiful and simple way of helping to make the world a better and more just place
lender.occupational_info: Right now i am volunteering at a community center through Americorps, but I plan to go back to school to get a masters degree in environmental studies.

lender.name: Ron P.
lender.loan_because: I spent time in a developing country when I was younger and saw that much progress could be made by helping individual entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Margit
lender.loan_because: I want to help people throughout the world to grasp opportunities in their local environment.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Alcohol and Drug Addiction Services in Oslo

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: i love to help people!

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student who is working towards her masters in English, specifically professional writing. I hope to have a career in the nonprofit sector.

lender.name: Demechi
lender.loan_because: I'm writing to seek for loan in your Oranisation and i belive that this payback of loan shark. I'm a progressive studen who in intend to study in the University of Glamorgan but i was turn back with all of my effort in the embassy, after paying a sum of 2000 pounds Sterling for my deposit. i finish from Boys Academy high school and as been in business since then traveling to dubia to buy clothes and trying to change the busines line by selling computers which has been the fastest max business in west-africa but thy have not been Captial to stand it. and i met a friend whom introduce me to KIVA.ORG Website who is called Stefan
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my work.. as a trading selling clothes and suites

lender.name: Richmon
lender.loan_because: I want to Purchase computers, for internet Café.
lender.occupational_info: I describe my work as Good Business that pays back quickly, Internet café business is booming in Ghana, so invest in my work and you will never regret. I’m young energetic, and i hold a professional diploma in web designing. Thank you!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Extend your hand..... It feels just as good to give as to receive.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I'm pretty sure there's a lot more to life than being really, really good looking. And I plan on finding out what that is.
lender.occupational_info: I hear words like "beauty" and "handsomness" and "incredibly chiseled features" and for me that's like a vanity of self absorption that I try to steer clear of.

lender.name: Donella
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to share and spread the abundance we have been blessed with. HOWEVER- I was loaning to Kiva and giving to charities and volunteering long before I ever HEARD of that upstart Nobama, and my sharing has nothing to do with what he thinks people should do or not do.
lender.occupational_info: I make a home with my semi-retired husband, and our 2 dogs. Our 2 children are grown; both are on their own, working and in college, and one is married, just made us grandparents for the second time and they are buying their own home! we are all very blessed ;D

lender.name: Hineline Boys
lender.loan_because: We believe everyone deserves the opportunity to try to make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: We are 6 and 9 year old boys whose parents are teaching us to share and help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise and that sometimes people just need a chance in life to pursue their goals.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: to extend my mutual aid circle

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me. I am an entrepreneur because friends believed in me. So I know that when people receive the chance to sell the service that they love to do, they release the energy that builds community.
lender.occupational_info: E-mail has turned all of us into writers. Businesses and universities hire me to teach their people better ways to write English so that others understand.

lender.name: Harold
lender.loan_because: the world can be made a better place when we help each other.
lender.occupational_info: Managing the computer networks that businesses use.

lender.name: Juliette
lender.loan_because: This really is one of the most lovely ideas ive ever come across.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with mental health problems get back on their feet.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are working to provide a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Behzad
lender.loan_because: “Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.”

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I believe micro loans are going to revolutionize several parts of the world that cannot afford to lose money from lenders who require exorbitant interest rates.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student, and I work for an international shipping company outside of school.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinancing can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: studying international development and human rights with an emphasis in Latin America

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I don't have a tonne of money and think this is perhaps the best way to get the most out of my giving as it just keeps going on and on.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I feel that God has blessed my family and I. I also would love to know that I'm making a change in the world.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to help others.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help hard-working people in developing countries and to give something back to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I provide environmental laboratory services that help to keep people healthy. I also work from home as a free-lance photographer.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: making a difference in the world is what it's about.

lender.name: Shad & Lizzy
lender.loan_because: We are so happy people gave us Kiva gifts for our wedding, we could have asked for nothing better!
lender.occupational_info: Im a glaciologist, working on sea level rise, adn lizzy works with kids who have major issues with reality

lender.name: clare
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I do many jobs and I find most of them very fulfilling. I am extremely thankful for that.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: We live in a land with so much when others struggle with so little.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: This really helps people to help themselves

lender.name: ASIA1030
lender.loan_because: A class of wonderful first year (mostly) students at the Australian National University, Canberra. This was our way of learning about microfinance firsthand.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: These are the loans that dreams are made of.......
lender.occupational_info: I trade commodities and stocks and do consulting for various commerical projects

lender.name: Htun Htun
lender.loan_because: I want to going to work in malaysia but not enough to use money for visa &passport fee .so ,everybody can help me that?I 'll pay back with a lot of greeting.
lender.occupational_info: I worked at entertainment city in myanmar(burma).

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Love the idea of kiva.org.

lender.name: Cecilia & Siggi
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help people to help themselves. Thank you and good luck!!

lender.name: Tim & Liz

lender.occupational_info: We make gourmet fudge (www.flippinfudge.com) and we farm (www.naturesharmonyfarm.com)

lender.name: Ivo
lender.loan_because: you've got to give people a chance
lender.occupational_info: Continuous Service Improvement initiatives

lender.name: Sorin
lender.loan_because: Becouse I want to make a diffrence.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a web developer.I create logos,pictures and websites in general.

lender.name: John & Terri
lender.loan_because: We've been fortunate and want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Queen La Chica
lender.loan_because: My mom is lucky enough to be able to, and would like to be able to lend a hand rather than give a handout .

lender.name: Heidi
lender.occupational_info: I am raising 2 children and helping them get adjusted to life in a new country.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone improve their standard of living.

lender.name: Minneh Karanja Kane
lender.loan_because: I want to support women in my native country - Kenya: I know how hard they work to keep going despite huge obstacles.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer for an international organization

lender.name: Mark Lodico
lender.loan_because: Being an effective social entrepreneur is the coolest most interesting way of being the change I want to see in the world. Kiva enables me to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology (theories of personality and life span developmental psychology -- from womb to tomb in 15 weeks). Mainly, I work as a chaplain at an urban hospital in Berkeley, California.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Just imagine making a difference.. Now, Why just imagine?
lender.occupational_info: I sell insurance to prevent financial catastrophies due to an accident or an Illness.

lender.name: brandon
lender.loan_because: i believe in making a difference that will ripple through the lives of countless people from the kindness of a few .
lender.occupational_info: struggling to survive like everyone

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs some help once in awhile.

lender.name: Mike & Desi
lender.loan_because: We want to liberate and empower women around the world to be independent and successful. We want all women to have choices - for how they live their life, who they live it with, and where they decide to live it.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: How could I not?
lender.occupational_info: I help make people look beautiful.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to be personally involved in growing small businesses around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I let computers 400 miles apart talk to each other.

lender.name: Sebastien
lender.loan_because: Human progress is our cause, liberty of thought our supreme wish, freedom of conscience our mission, and the guarantee of equal rights to all people everywhere our ultimate goal.
lender.occupational_info: technology related to security

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I can afford it .

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help Credit Unions operate more effectively.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It feels good! Technology used this way is an amazing gift... to be able to connect with others in a more personal way.
lender.occupational_info: I help people work together more productively.

lender.name: Robin & David
lender.loan_because: It's a beautiful idea.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to help others; with KIVA I get the opportunity to know a little more about who I am helping.

lender.name: Peterson's
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is contagious.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect forest lands for people and nature.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I have more money than I need, even as a graduate student. I spent last summer in Africa and gained an increased sense of global community and family. It is a joy for me to share what I have with my brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student getting an advanced degree in Occupational Therapy. When I get a job, I will help people with disabilities or injuries live and work independently and do the things that are important to them.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the people who I loan to. It is amazing to witness how much of an impact we can have on one another's lives if we just all pitch in a little!

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Those who can must!
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites and applications for companies.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I believe that these small loans can help these people get a leg up on the economic ladder.

lender.name: Zara
lender.loan_because: My Godfather gave me $100 when I was born
lender.occupational_info: I am 4 months old and learning all about the world

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would like to see poverty eliminated in the world.

lender.name: thuong
lender.loan_because: just because i can
lender.occupational_info: i work for Intel Corp., so i can go to my studio to paint. i paint so i can learn how to live.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe in microfinance.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. Enabling is what makes most sense. Through platforms like Kiva the world is enabling good people to help themselves.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is critical to business growth in global communities.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.occupational_info: My research is on the social and economic processes that generate environmental injustices in Ghana.

lender.name: Numa
lender.loan_because: Love to see people succeed
lender.occupational_info: a minister of the Gospel

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: It allows people to be able to control their destinies to a certain degree.
lender.occupational_info: Fire and safety

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: I want to support people doing the things they love.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in a developmental neuroscience lab. We are trying to find out which genes make different kinds of neurons so that someday we can use the brain's natural tissues to fix brain injuries and diseases like Huntington's, Lou Gehrig's disease, and Parkinson's.
I also enjoy knitting, sewing, and cooking!

lender.name: Marshall

lender.name: Lindsay

lender.occupational_info: I help people get loans on their houses or business buildings. It is also a great way to help people improve their financial situation. I'm very ETHICAL & FAIR. Email me: lindsay@scottmortgage.net

lender.name: WCE-INDIA
lender.occupational_info:
Energy efficiency and clean, renewable energy will mean a stronger economy, a cleaner environment, and greater energy independence for any country. By investing in technology breakthroughs today, our nation can look forward to a more resilient economy and secure future. Far-reaching technology changes will be essential to India's energy future. Working with a wide array of state, community, industry, and grass root NGO partners, the WCE INDIA through Solar Energy For All (SEFA) project invests in a portfolio of energy technologies that will:
Conserve energy in the residential, commercial, industrial, government, and transportation sectors. Increase and diversify energy supply, with a focus on renewable domestic sources. Facilitate the emergence of solar technologies as vital new "energy carriers." Upgrade India’s national energy infrastructure.
The Project aims to convert all existing electric power backup & hot water systems to solar power systems (electric, fuel or gas boosted) within 10 years and ensure all installations from 2010 are solar power & hot water systems. This is an ambitious goal and will require the commitment of several parties to achieve large-scale community behavioral change. The potential benefits facilitated by the Project are compelling and are detailed within the body of this report. The Project is unashamedly focused upon INDIA and has been designed to enable it to be replicated with other “green” products.

lender.name: Yuki
lender.loan_because: A loan helps hardworking, entrepreneurial individuals build their future.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for magazines and newspapers. When pressed, I will edit other people's writing, too.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I love lending to people who are "up to" something.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need a little help to make our dreams happen.

lender.name: wfrenchek
lender.loan_because: If I dont have faith in others how can I expect others to believe in me. The surest way to put an end to people living in squalor is to give them the means to achieve. Through education and opportunity all of lifes difficulties can be overcome

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I like to see betterment of mankind in helping in the only way I can by giving loans..

lender.occupational_info: I am a small businessman with a variety of interests.

lender.occupational_info: I work with the student government at a college in Canada to help them advocate for and provide services to their 14,000 student members.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: My life wouldn't be as wonderful as it is today if it weren't for help from others. I want to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info:
I work full time as a project coordinator offering project management support to engineers, scientists, and chemists in the nuclear medicine field and coordinate concept consideration and launching of innovation projects.
I also work part time as a projectionist at a historic movie theatre. I've had this job for many years and my love of film keeps me there.
Finally, my true passion is jewelry making. I have displays in local shops, attend the occasional craft/artisan show, and also have a little shop on Etsy.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people all over the world improve their lives. This has been a great experience and I encourage everyone to join in and see what a big difference a small contribution can make.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large mortgage corporation and I assist people with obtaining loans to purchase or refinance real estate.

lender.name: Mel

lender.name: Camille

lender.occupational_info: Alex is in communications and is going to school for computer science. Jessi works at a bank doing daily customer interactions of all sorts.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help people learn how to help themselves.

lender.name: Houran
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I care!!

lender.name: FIU Microlenders
lender.loan_because:
The FIU Micro Lenders, a new student organizing committee at Florida International University, as well as a non-profit 501c3 Florida corporation is committed to helping fight global poverty. Via mutually beneficial partnerships with local businesses, fund-raising efforts, and encouraging microfinance education for FIU's students they seek to provide tools for everyone to make their own contribution to a better world.
We will continue to forge partnerships within our community, raise awareness of the powerful force of microfinance, and redefine what it means to be an International Business student.
For more information or to join your energies to our fight, please email us at:
fiumicrolenders@gmail.com Second Kiva page at: www.kiva.org/lender/fiumicrolenderscorp
lender.occupational_info: We are International Business students enrolled at Florida International University.

lender.name: Amresh
lender.loan_because: I want to start my own Export Business. I have 4 years experience in this field and I know I can do better in business and makes good profit.
lender.occupational_info: It will basically an Export of Costume Jewellery form India to all other countries.

lender.name: Charise-Warrior Princess
lender.loan_because:
Charise is part of our family. She left this life on 7/31/07 after a valiant effort to overcome a cancer challenge.
We are honored to contribute to the micro-loans of hard-working people - in memory of Charise, Warrior Princess.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and choose to pass along my blessings
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am working in a food pantry where we distribute food to the hungry in our area. I also collect bread that would be tossed from the store and bring to the pantry.

lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at a better life...
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computers/electronics that fly/control aircraft.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm honored to be able to!
lender.occupational_info: Social Justice Education

lender.name: Bernadette and Paddy
lender.loan_because: We can!

lender.occupational_info: We work hard everyday teaching the future of this great country. It is not easy to be a teacher but it has its rewards too.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It is truly satisfying to be a part of a greater effort that helps those less fortunate provide for themselves, their families and their community.

lender.loan_because: a small donation from me can make a big difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field in an animal related business.

lender.occupational_info: I sell Sewing Patterns online. I am taking the profits and using them to fund Kiva Loans.

lender.loan_because: it gives individuals the one thing that is needed in order to empower themselves, self-actualize, and take control of their lives: hope.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can help others achieve their dreams - or at least short and mid term goals. The internet brought us all closer together and I feel happy to be able to help. I can hear the business owner’s story and plan, watch the progress, and hopefully celebrate in their success. Compared to my life of work, TV, eat, and sleep - I can, in a small way, participate with someone and their family doing something truly worthwhile and amazing.
lender.occupational_info: My job is difficult to describe. I listen, analyze, and talk about problems to other people that listen, analyze, and talk. I sit in front of a computer and work long hours but do not create anything real. I stare at information moving across my screen and try to identify problems - its like watching thousands of people getting on and off a train and trying to pick out two people wearing the same shoes

lender.loan_because: i start my business from zero . my family is not so rich. they unable to help me. so i borrow money from my friend. he apply heavy interst on this amount. now these days i pay most of money as a interst. this effect my business so much. if i get this loan i get rid from this heavy interst. for pay back i'm able to pay 5000/- Rs. per month if i get 100000 Rs.
lender.occupational_info: google

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because:
1. Titus 2:11-12 For the grace of God that brings salvation has appeared to all men. It teaches us to say 'No' to ungodliness and worldly passions, and to live self-controlled, upright and Godly lives in this present age, while we wait for the blessed hope - the glorious appearing of our great God and Savior, Jesus Christ,
2. Titus 3:7-8 So that, having been justified by his grace, we might become heirs having the hope of eternal life. This is a trustworthy saying. And I want you to stress these things, so that those who have trusted in God may be careful to devote themselves to doing what is good. These things are excellent and profitable for everyone.
3. Someone believed in me and now it's my turn to believe in someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Day job provides capital for a small business, which then creates tax savings and capital for another business, which further provides capital for stock market and property investments.

lender.name: Jan and Craig
lender.loan_because: We admire the creativity and work ethic of people who simply need seed money to be successful.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: It was a gift to me which I passed along to someone else.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of small business, personal responsibility, and self-help.
lender.occupational_info: marriage/divorce counseling, negotiation/arbitration, enabling people to sit down and talk things out.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: the money goes to hardworking people that just need a boost.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupation: Foster Mom to Mentally Challenged Boys

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: People have invested in me my entire life, now it's time for me to invest in others and return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I work in mobile telecommunications.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunities I've had in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save money by saving electricity, which helps them reduce their carbon footprints.

lender.name: Arleigh
lender.loan_because: so many of the adults I teach come from the countries I see here. I like to think I'm doing something to help their communities in their home countries.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to newcomers to Canada.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: Sometimes any one of us may need a small bit of help to allow us to make the big differences in our lives. What other investment can produce as great a return?
lender.occupational_info: I find ways to make buildings use less energy to operate. I also find ways to allow buildings to use renewable energy such as solar, wind, earth, and biomass.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I think a person reaps what he sows.
lender.occupational_info: A traveling student doing what she can to help others and bring glory to the good God above.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: The Personal MBA
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a way of showing how business can change lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info:
The Personal MBA is a project dedicated to helping its members educate themselves about business. The core of the Personal MBA is a list of the best business books currently available, which members can use to get a world-class business education quickly and inexpensively.
Premium Personal MBA services include members-only forums, special events, personalized learning plan development, and professional coaching.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for nurse researchers trying to improve patient care.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become self sufficent through their own investments.

lender.name: T. J.
lender.loan_because: I find the concept compelling...

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone less fortunate improve the quality of their life. I chose this as my device because it loans the money to people who are willing to put in hard work and determination to get to where they want to go.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a steel mill producing and refinishing steel coils.

lender.name: MillValley V-BallOldies
lender.loan_because: we beleive a little help can go a long way!
lender.occupational_info: Weekend volleyball players

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: the chicks dig it

lender.name: ROBERT
lender.loan_because: A myriad of reasons. I am blessed with the means to be able to loan. I can directly help a person who wants to lift themselves, their family and their community. And because there is no better diplomacy than people reaching across boarders to make each other's lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I help plan how to use talented consultants to make money.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I believe that is what Jesus would want us to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the US military and work in air planes.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: I believe in a HAND UP, not a HAND OUT.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: it's a way to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It is inspiring to know that the small loans we make to individuals and families trying to improve their economic situation can help make a big difference in their lives.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lender.name: mitzie
lender.loan_because: I'm able to help someone who's just trying to get along in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of peoples cats and dogs while they are away from home.
